headline: Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) Earnings Rise To US$7 Billion In Recent Quarter
summary: This quarter, Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) experienced a significant 20% increase in share price. This uptick aligns with major announcements, like its collaboration with Oracle to integrate MI355X GPUs into Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, offering improved price-performance for AI workloads. Partnerships with Infobell and mimik further highlight AMD's focus on AI innovation and cloud applications. The company's earnings announcement in May, with sales rising to $7.438 billion and net...

headline: AMD Is Gunning for Nvidia’s AI Chip Throne. Should You Buy AMD Stock Now?
summary: The Instinct MI400 chips have brought AMD within striking distance of Nvidia’s AI dominance. Is it time to ride that momentum?

headline: 2 Stocks Down 34% and 40% to Buy Right Now
summary: Tesla is a risky stock, but it's very well positioned to profit from the successful development of its robotaxi concept.  AMD could be on the verge of making big gains in the AI hardware market.  Despite some major sell-offs in the spring, the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite are up roughly 2% and 1%, respectively, as of this writing.

headline: AMD Runs Circles Around Intel With Helios Rack-Scale AI Systems
summary: Intel has largely given up on selling AI accelerators directly and is focusing on rack-scale solutions.  The AI strategy is still in flux, though, as new CEO Lip-Bu Tan revamps the company.  Meanwhile, AMD is set to roll out its new Helios rack-scale AI solution next year, likely beating Intel to market.

headline: 2 No-Brainer Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy on the Dip
summary: Tech stocks have soared in recent weeks, but some still offer good value.  ASML should capitalize on growth in AI as it's the only maker of EUV lithography equipment.  AMD is building momentum in the data center and beyond.
